title: DrInternet
author: DrInternet
content: النسخة الخضراء من البتكوين BTC (ايستيتيا) IUSعملة IUS تعتبر الجيل الثالث لعملة BTC. حيث تتميز هذه العملة بنفس عامل الأمان الا انها تتفوق على BTC من حيث السرعة واستهلاك الكهرباء للتعدين. يحتاج تعدين BTC إلى طاقة تقدر ب ١٢٧ تيرا وات ساعي سنويا بينما IUS تحتاج 603 كيلوات ساعي سنويا. العملة تعتمد بشكل اساسي على دعم الجماهير وقد تم طرح ٤% من العملة  للاكتتاب من أجل إدراجها بعدة منصات تداول. سيتم طرحها المبدئي بمنصة Coinsbit, وفي حال نجاح الاكتتاب، سيتم بطرحها بعدة منصات عالمية أخرى.  يمكن الاكتتاب عن طريق الموقع الرئيسي للعملة او عن طريق Coinsbit من خلال الرابط التاليhttps://www.iustitiacoin.org/presales The green variant of Bitcoin, known as  (IUSTITIA) IUS, represents the third generation of BTC. This digital currency shares the same level of security as BTC but outperforms it in terms of speed and energy efficiency for mining.While BTC mining consumes a staggering 127 TWh of energy annually, IUS requires a mere 603 kWh per year. This substantial reduction in electricity consumption sets IUS apart.The success of this currency relies primarily on the support of the masses. To facilitate its adoption, 4% of the currency has been made available for subscription, enabling its inclusion on various trading platforms. Initially, it will be offered on the Coinsbit platform. If the subscription proves successful, it will be made available on several other global platforms.To subscribe, interested individuals can visit the official website of the currency or utilize the provided link on Coinsbit.https://www.iustitiacoin.org/presales#IUS #Iustitia #BTC #cryptocurrency #BTC_AlternativeInvest Now In Iustitia CoinPre-Sales Link:https://coinsbit.io/ieo-list/IUS_121https://iustitiacoin.org/presalesRegister A Wallet : https://iuswallet.orgWhite paper : https://www.iustitiacoin.org/_files/ugd/f3cfe0_6383fc4c5c2f401ebcf5f38dc926aab1.pdfhttps://linktr.ee/iustitiacoinIustitia Coin Official Links :Coins Bit: https://coinsbit.io/ieo-list/IUS_121CMC : https://coinmarketcap.com/currencies/iustitia-coin/Official Website : https://www.iustitiacoin.org/Iustitia Web Wallet : https://iuswallet.org/Facebook: https://facebook.com/iustitiacoinInstagram: https://www.instagram.com/iustitia.coin/Telegram: https://t.me/IustitiaCoinIUSCoinTiktok: https://www.tiktok.com/@iuscoinLinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/company/iustitia-coin/Discord: https://discord.gg/8gFa8z7tbfMedium: https://medium.com/@Iustitia_CoinReddit: https://www.reddit.com/user/iustitia_coinyouTube : https://www.youtube.com/@IustitiaCoin
